wikitext.*:
'''Ebonies''' were a type of [[Trees|tree]]. [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]]'s [[song of Eärendil]] mentioned [[Eärendil]] as having "arrows shorn of ebony".<ref>{{Cite DTP|LR 2.01.143}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''1994: ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]—[[Treasures of Middle-earth (2nd edition)|Treasures of Middle-earth]]''''' 
:It was described as a rare tropical jet black tree known to the people of Pel, who call it ''Usamity''.<ref name="fourthpage">{{ICE|2010}}, p. 194</ref>
